author: Jamie Oliver
description: To quote Jamie Oliver, "the Huckle-my-buff is not a Dodo, but a Phoenix".
name: Huckle my buff
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: Gently BLEND all ingredients on a slow speed, then warm in a saucepan, gently stirring with a whisk (or microwave for 30 seconds and stir), POUR into warmed glass
If you make several servings in one batch, keep warm and serve from a sous-vide or heated soup kettle at to 60Â°C

video.description: To quote Jamie Oliver, "the Huckle-my-buff is not a Dodo, but a Phoenix".
video.name: HOWTO make Huckle my buff
